public void writeToFile(String filePath, String textToAdd) throws IOException {
public Deadline(String description, boolean isDone, LocalDate by) {
public String toSave() { return "D" + (isDone ? " true " : " false " ) + description + " /by " + by; }
public Event(String description, LocalDate from, LocalDate to) {
public Event(String description, boolean isDone, String from, String to) {
return "[E]["+ (isDone ? "X" : " " ) +"] description: " + description + " (from: " + from + " to: " + to + ")";
public String toSave() { return "E" + (isDone ? " true " : " false " ) + description + " /from " + from + " /to " + to; }
public String toSave() { return "T" + (isDone ? " true " : " false " ) + description; }

String help = "These are the commands available for you:
list
list (date)
find (word)
mark (list number)
unmark (list number)
todo (task)
deadline (task) /by (date)
event (task) /from (date) /to (date)
delete (list number)
bye";
String ending = "Bye. Back to my wonderland!";
System.out.println("Now you have "+ size +" in the list.");
